description: Gambian Health authorities refute claims donated items from China are contaminated with Coronavirus

The MRC Unit the Gambia published a statemet on false social media information on Corona Virus on their webpage. It basically says that the information circulating regarding the consumption of garlic being a preventive measure against Covid-19, is false. Furthermore, the public is reminded to stick to the key preventive measures such as washing hands.

President Barrow of the Gambia declares a public state of Emergency effective at midnight on 5th August 2020 and a curfew effective from 6th August 2020.

Gambian Court Sentences 39 People for Violating Curfew, regulation on face mask wearing due to violations of the Public Health (Dangerous and Infectious Disease) Protection Regulation 2020. Of the 39 people, 28 were fined D5000 and given six month jail time. The remaininf recieved one month jail time and a fine of D1000.
